front.title: The Strategist
front.setup: Search the villain deck for all Condition cards; put them aside as the Condition deck. Search the villain deck for all Trap cards; shuffle them and deal H face-down. Put the other trap cards aside. Put The Simurgh into play, "The Strategist" side up.

gameplay.p: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top card of the Condition deck.
At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top X cards of the villain deck, where X is the number of revealed trap cards + 1. Put them back on the villain deck in ascending order by their ⚠
At the end of the villain turn, if all trap cards are revealed, flip this card

front.advanced: Players may not discuss strategy or tactics

back.title: Wings Unfurled

gameplay.p: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top H + 1 cards of the villain deck. Put them back on the villain deck in ascending order by their ⚠
At the end of the villain turn, place a token on the Simurgh and deal all heroes X psychic damage, where X is the number of tokens on the Simurgh

back.advanced: Players may not discuss strategy or tactics

card.name: A Surfeit of Options
card.text: When this card is revealed if there are at least H Ongoing cards in play, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it

card.name: An Attack Expected
card.text: When this card is revealed if the Simurgh took damage last round, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it

card.name: A Backup Sabotaged
card.text: When this card is revealed if any hero has multiple copies of the same card in their hand, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it

card.name: A Wealth of Targets
card.text: When this card is revealed if there are at least H non-character-card targets in play, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it

card.name: An Unfortunate Malfunction
card.text: When this card is revealed if there are at least H Equipment cards in play, flip over a face-down trap card. Then return this card to the Condition deck and shuffle it
